channel.title: Posts on Welcome
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Welcome

item.title: Creating CLI With Golang
item.description: This post shows you how to create a cli (Command Line Interface) in golang. We are gonna use Github's public API to create a github-cli, which shows you info about users. We are not gonna use any third party packages. source code for this post https://github.com/M-krishna/github-cli Introduction The goal here is to capture the usernames from the argument and iterate over it until the data fetched from the server. We will make the fetching process concurrent by using Goroutines.

item.title: Creating ls Command With Golang
item.description: This post shows you how to create ls (list) command in golang. You may be already familiar with this command in linux and windows (powershell). We are not gonna use any third party packages. source code for this post https://github.com/M-krishna/ls Introduction The basic usage of ls command is to list all the files and folders inside a directory. We are also gonna add some additional info such as total number of files and directories.
